label: Voice of the Customer with NLP

branding.tagline: Understanding the voice of your customers has never been more important. Keboolaâ€™s Restaurant Reviews Block in partnership with ReviewTrackers gives you a detailed overview of your ratings and reviews, their topics, and a quick view of issues and opportunities.
